description_html:
Designed to deliver a deep-soaking bathing experience, fini•1 freestanding bathtub features a unique curvature of the base that provides a subtle design definition.

The seamless, one-piece tub stands at 68¾" x 31½" with a center drain complete with matching blu∙stone™ cover for a streamlined aesthetic.

Made from the brand's signature eco-friendly blu∙stone™ material, crafted primarily from quartzite, fini•1 provides superior water temperature retention allowing the bather to enjoy a longer luxurious soak.
